name: Black Friday Simulator (Amanda Osterkamp)
description:
In this game, players are racing against each other and the clock to buy the most items on the shopping list for the least cost.  Items are found randomly throughout the store and the same items can vary in price.  Players can interact with each other by bashing one another, forcing the other player to drop a random item item.

This game is an early prototype.  It uses Unity's networking system.

Controls:

-To move: WASD

-To pick up items: Space bar

-To drop items: LEFT-CLICK on the button in your inventory

-To bash another player: E

This project was created by:

Kevin Chase, Melody Chung, Amanda Osterkamp, and Kenneth Yam
